alert.note: Alert for Russell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 2:30PM EDT until May 16 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Russell County in south central Kentucky... * Until 200 PM CDT. * At 130 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jamestown, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jamestown, Jabez, Ono, Vinnie, Whittle, Rose Crossroads, Long Bottom, Sewellton, Karlus and Rowena. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
